jewelry.name: Ear Lobe Cuff Earrings
jewelry.desc: Handcrafted in 14-karat solid gold, the Ear Lobe Cuff Earrings are sleek, edgy, and straightforward in design.

jewelry.name: Hear Locket Necklace
jewelry.desc: Beautifully handcrafted in 14-karat solid gold, this charming heart-shaped locket is a sweet addition to your chains.

jewelry.name: Bubble Barely There Bracelet
jewelry.desc: Barely There Bracelet – This 14-karat yellow gold Barely There link bracelet is a classic minimal chain for the perfect understated look.

jewelry.name: Bold Round Diamond Link Ring
jewelry.desc: 14-karat gold Bold Round Diamond Link Ring with striking chunky chain design encrusted with pavé round cut natural diamonds.
